mapper.select: SELECT '테스트용' AS NICKNAME , 'BABASUNA' AS USERID , '서울특별시' AS ADDRSINAME1,'성동구' AS ADDRGUNAME1, '서울특별시' AS ADDRSINAME2,'강남구' AS ADDRGUNAME2, '서울특별시' AS ADDRSINAME3,'용산구' AS ADDRGUNAME3, '필라테스' AS INTERSUBNAME1 ,'영상편집' AS INTERSUBNAME2 , 'img/badge150pixel_0004_우수참석러-복사.png' AS URL , '3' AS REVIEWGRADE FROM DUAL
SELECT '테스트용' AS NICKNAME , 'BABASUNA' AS USERID , 'img/badge150pixel_0003_일반참석러.png' AS URL , '3' AS REVIEWGRADE FROM DUAL
